title: Internship
description: I secured my first unpaid internship at KBZ Bank Co. Ltd, where I worked as a full-stack web developer. During this time, I successfully completed four projects utilizing HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and C#.

title: Assitant Web Development Teacher
description: I have three years of teaching experience since by the time I was third year, So I embarked on my first career as an assistant web development teacher at Myanmar Route University.

title: Full Stack Web Developer
description: Initially, I started my journey as a Junior Web Developer at Myanmar ICT Solutions Co. Ltd. Through dedication and hard work, I was later promoted to the position of Mid-Level Developer. During my tenure, I made significant contributions to eight projects, utilizing technologies such as Laravel, CodeIgniter, React, jQuery, C# and others.

title: Senior React Developer (Remote)
description: Recently, I transitioned to TechBiz Co. Ltd, a US Based company, where I assumed the role of Frontend React Developer. However, amidst political changes.
